sentences.sentence: Pack the heaviest objects close to the body, and place little ones outside.
sentences.translation: 把最重的物品装在靠近身体的地方，把小物品放在外面。

sentences.sentence: Pack heaviest objects close to the body, and place little ones outside, away from the back.
sentences.translation: 把最重的东西放在靠近身体的地方，把小的放在外面，远离背部。

sentences.sentence: This was the heaviest and most fatiguing work of all.
sentences.translation: 这真是最粗重、最让人疲惫不堪的工作了。
